item.title: Check out 11 of the most popular Minor League caps in 2025 for National Hat Day - MLB.com
item.description: If the eyes are a window to the soul, a baseball cap is a window to a town. Through lore, industry, animals and oftentimes food, Minor League hats in particular tell a story about the culture and history of the area the team represents. Past lists: 2018 | 201…

item.description: After acquiring another established starting pitcher Wednesday, the Red Sox may be in position to move some of their younger starters.

item.title: Division I Cabinet adopts new transfer windows in several sports - NCAA.org
Greg Biffle's home burglarized weeks after plane crash - ESPN
item.description: Sheriff’s deputies are investigating an alleged break-in and theft last week at the North Carolina home of retired NASCAR driver Greg Biffle, one of seven people who died in a plane crash last month.

item.title: Ja Morant (calf) to miss game vs. Magic in Berlin - NBA
item.description: Memphis' star guard will miss the NBA Berlin Game 2026 against Orlando with a right calf contusion.

item.title: FTC asks 20 schools if agents are following law - ESPN
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission is asking 20 universities with Division I sports programs whether agents working with their athletes are following a federal law tied to sports-agent conduct.

item.title: Arrest warrant issued for WBA champ G. Davis - ESPN
item.description: An arrest warrant has been issued for WBA lightweight champion Gervonta “Tank” Davis in connection with an alleged domestic violence incident dating back to October.

item.title: NFF Announces All-Star 2026 College Football Hall of Fame Class - National Football Foundation
item.description: IRVING, Texas (Jan. 14, 2026)– The National Football Foundation (NFF) & College Hall of Fame announced today the 2026 College Football Hall of Fame Class during “College Football Live Presented by Great Clips” on ESPN2.

item.title: Here are each team's first workout dates of Spring Training 2026 - MLB.com
item.description: Following are the first workout dates, subject to change, for pitchers and catchers as well as full squads of the 30 Major League clubs for 2026 Spring Training.
